attributes.action: Award Danger Pay Raise for ALL Care Works Across the board!
attributes.additional_details:
All the Front Line Workers caring for our sick currently should be awarded a 'Danger Bonus' rate as they are putting their life on the line to care for the public.

We need to appreciate what these 'carers' do on  a daily basis for us. 24/7 - 365 days a year.  

This career takes a lot of dedication and compromise form the 'carers', doing work that only a select few will and can do, doing things like most of us wouldn't even dream of doing while caring for our loved ones and ourselves, saving dignity and SAVING lives!

They deserve the recognition and thanks they deserve a significant pay rise!
attributes.background: To AWARD BASIS PAY AWARD to ALL CARE WORKS ACROSS THE BOARD, From nurses - HCA's - Through the NHS, Private Homes, Charity Homes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
